definition: enclosing frame made of bamboo, wire etc/cage/basket/steamer basket/to cover/to cage/to embrace/to manipulate through trickery

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: He jumped onto the table, turned over the cage tried to catch me.
sentences.chinese: 它跳上桌子，把笼子掀倒，企图抓住我。

sentences.english: The crabs broke this thin net at the first time.
sentences.chinese: 下第一次笼子之后螃蟹就将这个细网子弄破了。

sentences.english: The priest's two male parrots are holding rosary beads and praying in their cage.
sentences.chinese: 牧师的两只公鹦鹉正夹着念珠在笼子里作玫瑰经祷告。

sentences.english: I watched the Barrow Prisons for over 10 thousand years.
sentences.chinese: 我守护这个手推车铁笼子已经有1万多年了。

sentences.english: The first, this coming Jan. 1, is a ban on caging egg-laying hens.
sentences.chinese: 明年1月1号首先被禁止的是笼子饲养的产蛋鸡。

sentences.english: As the scientists' models predicted, the cages quickly grew darker over time.
sentences.chinese: 如科学家模型预测的那样，笼子会随时间迅速变黑。

sentences.english: The circus experienced a calamity when the tigers escaped from their cages.
sentences.chinese: 当老虎从笼子里逃出来时，马戏团经历了一场灾难。

sentences.english: The bird escaped from the cage.
The animals are kept in tiny cages and can hardly move at all.
sentences.chinese: 动物们被关进小笼子里，几乎都不能动弹。

sentences.english: I took it out of its cage , opened the window and my hand.
sentences.chinese: 我把它从笼子里放出来，把窗户打开，我的手张开。
因此，必须把它关到笼子里。

sentences.english: The rabbits wormed their way out of the cage .
sentences.chinese: 兔子从笼子里钻了出去。

sentences.english: And the best love story is just two love-birds in a cage.
sentences.chinese: 而最好的爱情故事就是两只在同一个笼子中的相思鸟。

sentences.english: My sister and I are jammed into a small cage, I hear other puppies here.
sentences.chinese: 所以我们姐妹俩被关到笼子里送到一个奇怪的地方。

sentences.english: The tiger in the cage gave a thrilling cry.
sentences.chinese: 笼子里的老虎发出了令人毛骨悚然的吼声。

sentences.english: I was hanging my pants up in the closet when I noticed Madam Octa's cage.
sentences.chinese: 我正在把裤子挂进衣柜，突然看见了八脚夫人的笼子。
